definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (acc. to Ol:§ 277 k. 3 [[יקת]] is Impf. from a √ [[קות]], meaning dubious; poss. = [[יְקוּתִיאֵל]] q.v.; see Wetzst in De:Is 3:703 f.)—
in the Shephelah of Judah Jos 15:38, site unknown; LXX Iakarehl A Iekqahl, LXXL Iexqahl.
name given to [[סֶלַע]] (= Petra) by King Amaziah, its captor 2Ki 14:7; LXX Kaqohl; A Iekqohl.
